properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (USER_NO=NOTICE_WRITER) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER, CREATE_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE)
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, USER_ID, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = N.NOTICE_WRITER) WHERE NOTICE_NO=? AND N.STATUS='Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT=COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO=? AND STATUS='Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? , NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS='Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS='N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS='Y'
